scripts.build:sharp:local: rm -rf sharp-local && yarn remove sharp && yarn add sharp && cd node_modules/ && cp -a sharp/. ../sharp-local
scripts.build:sharp:lambda: yarn remove sharp && yarn add sharp --ignore-scripts && yarn docker:sharp:lambda
scripts.local:test: export SHARP='../../sharp-local' && sls invoke local -f test  -p ../fixtures/event.json
scripts.watch:test: export SHARP='../../sharp-local' && sls invoke local --watch -f test  -p ../fixtures/event.json
